headline: Holding(s) in Company
summary: TR-1: Standard form for notification of major holdings 1. Issuer Details ISIN GB00BYT1DJ19 Issuer Name ICG PLC UK or Non-UK Issuer UK 2. Reason for Notification An acquisition or disposal of voting rights 3.
